In the 2.2 M6, I defined a cube with two dimensions (one for column, one for row) and only one measure. One of the two dimension can have a null value (row one).

When executing my reports with the according crosstab, it seems that it is not possible.

TabularCube NewTabularCube: 
- The value of key column can not be null. Key column: DIVISION_CODE.
